website_summaries.verdict: Affordable laundry pods by a popular brand in laundry products with a lavender scent that smells mild and soothing on clothing, linens, and more.
pros: Lavender scent has subtle floral notes that appeal to most people
Top-selling brand and a good value
Sturdy plastic tub with wide opening keeps the pods fresh
Work well when used in high-efficiency washing machines
cons: A few reports of the pods not dissolving, especially in cold water
Not all customers liked the scent, but it is preferred by most users
Not as softening – more for scent-boosting

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the fabric softener pods.
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy again. I have a front loader and even in hot water they don't dissolve and leave a residue like super glue on my clothes that I cannot remove. I have ruined shorts, sheets, etc. However, since I don't want to lose the money already spent, I found if I cut open the pod and pour the contents into the section for fabric softener in my front loader, it does work and the clothes smell great. I honestly love this scent! Maybe i got a bad batch...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gurile

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product would never use again . Had problems with cross contamination with other products .. messed up 2 pair of my jeans that was $140 plus for and the company offered me $25 for my inconvenience.. I will never buy this product again or anything from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Aroma!
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice strong but pleasant scent. Not too powerful but really lovely especially for doing your bedding. Nice scent to fall asleep too. Also like how the scent fills the laundry room while using it. It’s like an air freshener inside of My washing machine. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love these little nuggets of freshness
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a cost effective substitute for gain flings/downy unstoppables/etc. Don’t need fabric softener, either, the smell is nice and stays awhile! The only thing that irritates me is how amazon packages things: this is the second time my container was busted open and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni D

customer_reviews.title: It works , but you have to use a lot and put at the bottom of the washer before clothes!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good product. It sends your clothing but I have to use 3-4 packets per load and I think 1, 2 of its a big load should do the job. The sent itself is pretty nice, not too strong and is unisex, although my favorite is hibiscus scent by snuggle. I do recommend this for people like myself who like their clothing to have a nice fabric softener smell to them, it is of the better scent boosters.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing and Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The SMELL!!! I cannot say enough about how good these make your laundry smell! I get compliments all the time from guests about how good my towels/laundry smells. They are long lasting, compact and so easy to toss in the laundry. Love these little packets!
customer_reviews.author: 🐰 Bunny 🐰

customer_reviews.title: My laundry smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these scent packs, when I found them on sale at a local store. The price for laundry smell goods is perfect. I love the scent of these and every other scent they sell in this product! I only use dryer balls in my dryer so I missed the smell of dryer sheets and these scent boosters have aided in that loss. They also don’t leave a residue like some products do. They dissolve in cold water...I have had one get stuck under the door of my front load washer
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always dissolve
customer_reviews.text: It's a hit or miss if it will dissolve. It left a plastic residue on my sheets I didnt see and dryed it so it made it worse. At first I thought something got in with the laundry. Then I realized what it was. I used oxyclean stainstick and a nailbrush to scrub it off. I still use them but only on small loads of towels or sheets and I check them before the dryer, only use hot water and use an extra rinse just in case. Wont buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jag

customer_reviews.title: This is a gimmick, stay away.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to have when you run out of fabric softener. But mostly it just makes me feel like I am doing something extra for my laundry to smell nice. Doesn't really do anything and I will not be purchasing this again in the future. Don't waste your money. It was like I used nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy E. Hoeck

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good and lasts forever!
customer_reviews.text: This is really short, but these are amazing! Seriously lovely scent that I can really smell even after a week in a drawer. And we use dryer balls ( also sold here on Amazon ), so we add a little ylang ylang scent as well. But the one that you still smell at the end of the week the most is the Snuggle booster. Seriously crazy to me that the heat from the dryer doesn’t Burn it off, but it doesn’t. I love these! I might try another scent, but I love this one. So I might just stay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa wickey

customer_reviews.title: Neither Lavender NOR Joy
customer_reviews.text: Who invented this awful stuff and why did I waste my money on it? The pods smell nice while still dry and in the container but once you put them into your wash they literally simply wash away all scents and isn't that the reason I bought it to begin with? I did better just spraying my clothes with a fabreeze type product. I wish I could get all my money back. AVOID this junk. It is useless to the max.
customer_reviews.author: mark debrizzi

customer_reviews.title: love the scent and convenience
customer_reviews.text: These little scent boosters smell amazing. I read some said they had trouble with the plastic capsule not dissolving right so I do hold them under the washer water and squeeze them to break them down (I have an older machine that I can still start to fill with the lid open )
customer_reviews.author: BK in FW

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. Will prob just buy from the store.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed t be harder than the usual ones I buy fresh from the store ....they also don’t melt and dissolve as they should sometimes I’ve taken out a few loads with these opened, but not dissolved and stuck to my clothes. Especially when I don’t see them and put in dryer. They melt some and stick to my clothes and I have to rewash. Smell Devine though.
customer_reviews.author: cwell06

customer_reviews.title: Really Like
customer_reviews.text: I got these in place of the normal fabric softner. I am actually quite happy with these and the smell that all my laundry has. Sometimes, fabric softner may leave a residue on clothing. I did not see this with this product. So I would recommend for anyone wanting to try something different. I also use Snuggle dryer sheets, so that gives an added aroma which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these things! I first got them at the grocery store because they were on sale. When I used them I loved how simple they were to use and made my laundry smell really good and fresh for longer. I'll continue to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Whitenack

customer_reviews.title: Better than laundry beads. I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They smell so good and are so easy to use. I’ve seen reviews about them not dissolving and I haven’t had any issues like that so far. I have a top load washer on cold water so maybe this makes a difference. These smell so good and they are such a great price. I will definitely subscribe for the next time I need them. I might try the different scent too next time but the lavender smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Alexander

customer_reviews.title: No reaction with super sensitive skin, love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin so I cannot use many products. I bought these hoping I could, and they are amazing! My nasty work clothes always smell great now, my behind etc. I don't have any reaction to these. Also, everyone at my job site always tells me I smell so good lol. I highly recommend these. They work better for me than liquid fabric softener (for the clean fresh scent). Since I'm stuck using all natural detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Burr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Okay. Super awesome smell BUT we ended up having to slice the little pods down the center in two ways: 1.) To throw into hot water washes, and 2.) To empty the contents out entirely into warm and cool washes. The little pods DO NOT desintegrate on their own, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every month. I have a family of 5 and I was clothes everyday. So this lasts me about a month a little over sometimes depends on how big the load is. But definitely a good value for really good smelling clothes that last. I use Purex laundry detergent and the dryer sheets that match this smell.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Reed

customer_reviews.title: YOU GOTTA TRY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY!!! I love this stuff!!! I always wanted my clothes to smell good, and this stuff works great. We use a laundry soap that is unscented for the most part so this adds a great essence to our clothes. Our towels are so nice and even our regular clothes hold the scent very well. Either right out of the dryer, or dresser drawer a week later, they smell wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: I had thought that theses would be just as good as Unstoppables but I was wrong. First, if you wash in cold water, they don’t fully dissolve. Secondly, the scent doesn’t last as long as their competitors. The one positive is that you don’t get those little pellets on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: FatwalletFan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not effective better to buy the other brand
customer_reviews.text: These smell good but my clothes don’t really smell like it afterwards. The scent does t stay as long. I got these as a cheaper alternative to unstoppables. That is exactly what they are, cheap but not effective. I used like 4 in one load once just to see. Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: John & Linda Bushko

customer_reviews.title: Crappy packing lead to real mess
customer_reviews.text: I just received my two containers in one box ups the box was so bad I just knew when I opened the box there would be a problem!! Plastic containers split open and pods every where and some broke open Nooo packing what so ever I realize there is a lot going on right now BUT COME ON!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: These scent boosters are my jam!
customer_reviews.text: Laundry is one of the tasks most of us dislike but we have to do! I love good smelling clothes and let's face it detergent and fabric softener fades in the dryer! Then I found these laundry scent boosters and they have become my jam! The scent is amazing and I stopped using fabric softener, one scent pack is enough!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It smelled nice
customer_reviews.text: I like snuggle so that is why I deiced to order it. It works good and the smell seems to stay on your clothes but not for too long. I'm not sure why but I felt is should of been sealed better instead of just the top lid it should have had a sealant under the lid. This would have kept the freshness longer. That is why I'm giving it a 3*.
customer_reviews.author: Violeta Velevski

customer_reviews.title: Don't use
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I used this product it ruined my load of laundry. I followed the instructions and placed it in the bottom of the washer, followed by detergent, then the clothes. Once the cycle was done I noticed a huge discoloration in my expensive Anthropologie jacket. I reached out immediately to Henkel Consumer Goods Inc. to share the issue and I was told that there is no ingredient in the Snuggle Scent Boosters that capable of causing bleaching stains. I beg to differ since the shape and size matches the pac that clearly adhered to my jacket during the wash. So I highly recommend that you do not use this product.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l cronk

customer_reviews.title: Great pods for laundry days
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness of this item it's better than the blue iris one .I will be buying this product once done .Please dont change the formula of this neither .This for 5 bucks its worth the buy for it 54 pods I usually put two in mine and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa barbosa

customer_reviews.title: These are great but the scent is very strong
customer_reviews.text: These are great but the scent is very strong. it stays on the clothes for a really long time which is nice as long as you really love the scent. definitely do what they say as far as dropping it to bottom of washer as well or it will not always dissolve quickly. Revision: after using for several loads I have come to the conclusion that the scent is just too strong for us. It is a little overwhelming so go to the store first and make sure you like the scent. but they definitely work and do as they should
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting smell 😓
customer_reviews.text: I love that these come in a tub. They smell awesome but the smell doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lavender - Earth's Natural Stress and Sleep enhancer.
customer_reviews.text: Garments, blankets, even washable toys - are enhanced by Lavender ever-so-softly. Lavender is well known for its scent and uses to relieve daily stress to sleep inducing. it is very addicting, easy to use. Just throw in with your laundry soap or laundry pod. The scent lingers, even when they are dried in dryer or hung outside to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Steppin' Time

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent.. Wish there was a bit more scent..also wish my cloths were a bit softer.. I solved my issues buy using twice the amount that's suggested and its as good as im willing to spend. I love the convenience of these versus liquid..:)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Its like you used nothing at all.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell I had used anything at all. The stuff from the packet got on a couple of my black t shirts and I'm trying to get it out. No fragrance no freshness. I really hoped these worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kreg

customer_reviews.title: Love to add these to loads with jackets!
customer_reviews.text: I wear jackets and hoodies year round, and I love to add a packet of these to those loads. My clothes smell fresh, but not overwhelmingly scented. Everything seems fresher too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Left Stains On My Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of these pods. However, they did leave oil like spots on my clothes! I read reviews on these same pods from other seller's pages but did not think much of it as I did not see those same reviews from this seller. I will not purchase again as these spots have permanently damaged my expensive clothing. I do not recommend to buy this unless you do not care about the lasting stains.
customer_reviews.author: wildgold

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not very strong. I tried using 3 pods in a small load and I still couldn’t smell it once the clothes came out of they dryer. You can smell it on wet clothes but not dry clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a much nicer scent than most of the other wash enhancers. It has better staying power too and is not overwhelmingly masculine or feminine. Just a very nice smell
customer_reviews.author: SSBDW

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love with these!
customer_reviews.text: These little pods smell soooo good. I put 2 in each load of laundry because I like a really strong scent. Comes out of the dryer smelling great! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: MommaFrog

customer_reviews.title: Works their magic!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent, fresh smelling, makes clothes soft. These pods are hard to find in our city. They are usually sold out or stores stopped carrying them. We use them with every load of laundry we do. We’ve always managed to find them on Amazon, luckily. Very happy family with these in the home.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio , Texas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Lovely scent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I needed an extra boost to my laundry and these do the job! They help make my load smell nice and fresh. Also, the scent is nice and subtle, not overly strong and it is long lasting. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: A.Gonz

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a load of laundry that I ran on cold, and it ruined 4 pieces of brand new clothes. It left a sticky dark substance on the clothes that will not come off. Plus, it doesn’t even make the clothes smell good. I thought this product would be a great more cost effective alternative to the laundry scent beads, but it just ended up ruining my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: but these definitely dissolve better in warm or hot water
customer_reviews.text: Says you can use water of any temperature, but these definitely dissolve better in warm or hot water. Kind of disappointed because the smaller pack (same brand) seemed to have a stronger longer lasting scent, these aren't anywhere near as noticeable. Definite bonus points for convenience though!
customer_reviews.author: Pat and Kai

customer_reviews.title: Scent not strong or lasting
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these are wonderful except that you can't smell it on your clothes after they are dried. That's my only complaint. I used extra, I usually threw 4in, and I still couldn't smell it on my clothes when I folded them
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love these they really get all those funky smells to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is super awesome! I’ve used these for a few years,and they never let me down. The smell is amazing and it last. A must have for laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: ⇜L💜VE the SMELL!!⇝
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these smell, I throw them into every load of laundry I do... I buy them every chance I get when I find them on sale trust me you will not regret buying these at all. They are cheap, affordable, they are compatible with all HE washers, and it's made by Snuggle a brand I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Marine_Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting scent!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves Snuggle products and the Lavender Joy scent boosters are at the top of our list with their scents! The fresh scent lasts for weeks and it definitely leaves our clothes soft. Makes wash days easier when the product is trusted by you and your family!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they make our laundry smell! I use the whole line of this scent. Only thing I hate is that the outer shell will get stuck to clothes sometimes and not fully dissolve!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: Great scent & keeps clothes smelling fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love using these in my laundry. It boosts the scent on the clothing and lasts. The scent of the lavender is not overwhelming and is calm.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle laundry boosters are a nice addition to the laundry
customer_reviews.text: Snuggle laundry scent boosters are fresh smelling and affordable. They are much easier than the liquid fabric softeners and the scent is fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Sue

customer_reviews.title: Best scents!
customer_reviews.text: Mmmm 😋 love the smell.. Even use as carpet freshener, just cut one open and sprinkle on rug and it makes it smell wonderful.. Also clothes of coarse.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We only need to use one in our smaller washer/helps keep clothes smelling great longer than a normal wash. Love it and use with every wash.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: Great product to help your clothes smell wonderful and you won’t break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Lace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't completely dissolve
customer_reviews.text: They smell nice, but they dont break down as they should in the machine. The outer covering sticks to the clothes, and doesnt dissolve all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my clothes smell when I use this. My clothes are soft. I think this is best when washing with hot water
customer_reviews.author: Bree Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ewwwwww
customer_reviews.text: this stuff definitely does NOT smell like lavender in any way. The closest I can describe it is bathroom air freshener scent. As the small fades, it changes and actually smells like tobacco smoke. I've had three people at three separate places ask me if I'd been smoking...I have never smoked. Once, I put on a work shirt directly out of the dryer while the smell was still strong and people in the office kept making comments about "someone" wearing old lady's perfume. If you like this stuff, great...but be warned
customer_reviews.author: Tokyo Sandblaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Ive used the snuggle brand for a long time! Now I can order it from amazon and it be here the next day! Highly recommend for people with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Black

customer_reviews.title: so it is safe to assume I love them! I'm quite fond of scents
customer_reviews.text: I'm a recurrent buyer of this product through shop & save, so it is safe to assume I love them! I'm quite fond of scents, especially in laundry detergents and softeners, because I like my clothes to smell good. This is something I love about these fabric softeners pods, they leave my clothes smelling great, the scent even liners in my closet and drawers. I recommend these pods because they're also convenient, just one for each load and no measurements are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Rodz

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Love how these make my linens smell. I use shared commercial machines which usually leave your clothes with a funny smell. Not with these! Regular and High Efficiency machine's. Always melts. Leaves a great scent that lasts all week. Got a subscription for my Sister. She loves them too! Once their was some residue on her husband's jeans but that did not stop her from continuing to use them. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely order more
customer_reviews.text: I luvvvvvvvvvvv this product! They smell wonderful! Only one pod is needed per load! My husbands uniforms smells soooo fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: lystra ali

customer_reviews.title: great smell
customer_reviews.text: The sent is great and it lasts a long time on my towels. I like that you only have to put one tablet in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: J. L

customer_reviews.title: Fresher than ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these scent booster pods so much, and even though I was skeptical about the lavender scent it ended up making my clothes smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: YaDumb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Loves this item works great and your clothes smells so good and fresh bought both scents like them all will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kamerick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this despite the negative reviews i gave it a try and was pleasantly surprised, nice smell no mess works great will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sent booster without any known side effects that I'm aware of
customer_reviews.text: These are by far are the best value for your money that I have seen for any type of sent booster that works as good as these do. Unfortunately my elderly mother is bedridden and I have to wash some smelly sheets and blankets every other day. Vinegar alone would never take care of the smell but just add these and everything comes out as fresh as could be. I am a huge fan of these for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer lyn S

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE LINEN HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and product works amazing with the amazon laundry pods. Very clean and fresh scent!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love that smell
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lavender scent. Easily pop these scent pacs into my washer, no more measuring, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a laundry lady, and I have been using these about 4 years now. Smells like heaven on a stick!!! Also great to mix with water and spritz fabric at home and the car!
customer_reviews.author: JustALadyN-Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes stiff and hard
customer_reviews.text: Rating 3 out of 5 stars because smell is OKAY, but it makes my clothes stiff. Probably won't buy again but not returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: CJay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice smell excellent product just pop one in and your clothes come out smelling as fresh as can be
customer_reviews.author: Bonziamaster

customer_reviews.title: I've never smelled so good
customer_reviews.text: I have apparently been completely missing out. I rarely use softeners because I don't have a softener ball nor do I have a washer that has a special compartment for it. When I saw these, I figured, "why not?". OMG. My clothes and sheets smell so amazing!!!!! I have literally had people compliment me on my smell after I wear anything washed with these. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Fulla03

customer_reviews.title: Some do not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: Good scent but sometimes they do not dissolve and the plastic gets stuck to the laundry :(
customer_reviews.author: Marilee0123

customer_reviews.title: Like Snuggle...Not this Scent
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of this scent. But love the product nonetheless. The Blue Iris and Exotic Island Dream scents are best by far!
customer_reviews.author: LucyRed1967

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: Clothes smell fresh and easy to use. However, if you use a dryer on the clothes, the scent is reduced.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleGirl2016

customer_reviews.title: Fresh laundry!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh laundry scent is my favorite. Nothing is better than someone saying your clothes smell like you just got out of the dryer. Easy to use. One issue I have is sometimes it gets stuck in the rubber area of my front loading washer.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Baker

customer_reviews.title: You are going to love this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It adds so much to your washing experience. Everything smells so good
customer_reviews.author: Diva3482

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Downy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge downy unstoppables fan but they were running a promotion on these so I decided to try. 1) Easier: they are a packet you just throw in, 2) the smell is wonderful- my whole bed was relaxing lavender, 3) totally comparable in price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: These boosters makes your wash smell great. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TBD13

customer_reviews.title: Clothes smell so good for weeks even hanging in the closet!
customer_reviews.text: These make your clothes smell amazing! Especially coupled with their fabric dryer sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good amount
customer_reviews.text: Great booster for smelly boyfriends clothes! He works construction and his clothes are so smelly, this is a great addition. Or in general. Lavender is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: We love the scent of the Snuggle Boosters! Amazon gives me fast shipping at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: MsMoe11

customer_reviews.title: Great value for size!
customer_reviews.text: I ditched Downey liquid fabric softener and I don't plan on looking back! Smells amazing and lasts longer than Downey. I have to stop myself from rewashing clean clothes so I can use the scent boosters.
customer_reviews.author: a2z ConsumerTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I love the smell. Very fresh not feminine just overall pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Harper BC

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and my clothes always smell and feel wonderful after using them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for a while and love them. The scent lasts for weeks. Easy to use just throw a pack in and do a wash like normal.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Buyer 85

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm?
customer_reviews.text: They need to do some more R&D on the dissolving container. I just got my first gooey mess on my clothes as well. I thought the solution was to be sure to put the product in the tub before clothes from on top but that didn't solve it. Doing a load right now where I took a pair of scissors and cut the package and empty the powder into the tub. Film@11
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I used these whenever I'm washed towels, bedding and curtains. Great long lasting scent.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fryman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Scent is AWESOME! One little pack boosts the laundry scent perfectly. Laundry smells clean and fresh! Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE THINGS! AWESOME PRICE AWESOME QUALITY AND SMELLS FABULOUS. NO COMPLAINTS
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA FIGUEROA

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've been using thing for years and I love using it.My package came in good condition.... So thank you again Amazon/sellers!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Igesumal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered and I didn't realize these were shipped. They were sealed tightly but when I opened them they smell amazing! I pop them in my loads of clothes and my husband asked what was I using. These boosters hold the smell for more than just a couple of weeks. I'm wearing a shirt I washed almost a month ago and it smells just as fabulous today. I've been happy with all the scents and will continue to order!
customer_reviews.author: KarmaJ

customer_reviews.title: It is alright
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase. As for the smell, it is a bit lighter and definitely not long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Rose r

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I use these everytime i do laundry. Love them. They make your clothes smell great.

customer_reviews.title: Freshens
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Gives really great smell to the clothes. Happy to buy more of it.
customer_reviews.author: e.c.h

customer_reviews.title: Great value and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are the best scent boosters. Other brands smell great out of the washer, bilirubin these smell best after the dryer. Most economic and effective scent boosters on the market.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like these don’t do a whole lot...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these work as well as the Downy scent beads, but I do think you get more washes out of them. I’d give them 2.5 stars, because they help boost the fragrance a little bit, but nothing like the beads.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: I find it simpler to buy off of amazon than the store. I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smell and price
customer_reviews.text: These little rascals help with putting the perfect amount of fabric softener in the wash and the smell last for weeks. However, if you do a second rinse on your clothes the smell isn't as noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Klaben

product_meta.title: Snuggle Scent Boosters In-Wash Laundry Scent Pacs, Lavender Joy, 56 Count
product_meta.description: Discover true happiness with this blend of sweet floral scents and soothing lavender essence. Great for all types of clothes, including active wear and sleepwear, these concentrated Pacs conveniently dissolve completely in your wash with no messes or spills. Simply place a Scent Pac into the washer drum before adding your laundry, adding detergent as you normally would. Scent Boosters are safe for all washing machine types, including HE. Includes one tub of 56 scent booster pacs.
feature_bullets: Discover true happiness with this blend of sweet floral scents and soothing lavender essence.
Great for all types of clothes, including active wear and sleepwear, these concentrated Pacs conveniently dissolve completely in your wash with no messes or spills.
Simply place a Scent Pac into the washer drum before adding your laundry, adding detergent as you normally would.
Scent boosters are safe for all washing machine types, including HE.
Includes one tub of 56 scent booster pacs.
Add a boost of freshness to every load with Lavender Joy, a fragrant blend of sweet orchid and plumeria notes combined with soft vanilla and the soothing essence of lavender
Simply toss pac in your washer at the beginning of the cycle
Handy Pac means no spills, no mess
One package includes scent boosters for 56 regular-sized loads

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
